title: Augmented Cache Question!
body: If i buy an augment cache and wait for a new skin to be released and then open the cache, is there a chance of me getting the new skin?

replies.body: if i craft something i already own from the augment caches, what happens?

Yes, if you waited for a new skin to be released, opening your augmented cache would give you a chance to get that new skin. Keep in mind that what you get out of the cache is pretty much random, though, with the only modifier being that it prioritizes for content you don't already own. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
